title: Episode 3: Predictions, Predictions
description:
It’s the beginning of the year and it seems like everyone is making predictions. How about this one: people with large brains are smarter than people with small brains. Don’t believe it? Neither do...

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
